alert.note: Alert for Collingsworth; Donley; Wheeler (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 31 at 5:33PM CDT until May 31 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN WHEELER...COLLINGSWORTH AND SOUTHEASTERN DONLEY COUNTIES... At 533 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Wellington, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Locations impacted include... Wellington, Shamrock, Dodson, Lutie, Twitty, Dozier, Lela, Samnorwood and Quail. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
